name: The Shriven
description:
The Shriven

Stuck in purgatory as one of the shriven, you must platform, puzzle solve, and fight your way out.

Now that, that is taken care of... we did not get quite as far with it as we had hoped, so since there is a very noticeable lack of the tutorial we wanted to include, here are the controls and a bit of need to know.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar
  •  Climb/Mantle: Spacebar while staring at a wall)
  • Alt: Crouch (rolls if double tapped)
  • Q: Switches you between your light and shadow forms.  Take note, as most of the stuff you will run into revolves around this... that's your hint ;)
  • LMB: Attacks with the melee weapon of your current form. (light or shadow)

Now then, after all that... You will notice a lot of stuff that we didn't get to finish, things not working properly, or flat out missing etc.   We would apologize but... we had 48 hours and we had a blast and that's whats it really all about!  Though we do hope that you might find at least a bit of fun, running around, exploring and fighting your way through our purgatory, and seeing if you are smart enough to figure out how to play the game since we did not have time to finish the tutorial!  :D

Miss Lana, thank you for hosting the jam, it was a blast and a pleasure to participate in!!! 

OK, we will actually give you one more hint since it is so crucial to overcoming some of the gigantic pitfalls you will come across.  

These are "Soul Pillars"

Be on the lookout for them as you explore, as they play a very noticeable part in your advancement!
